title: You’re Gonna Like the Way You See with Jian DeLeon
description:
It’s never too late to come back home. Sometimes a fashion podcast needs to podcast about fashion and that’s just what we’re doing this week with our old pal and human encyclopedia, men’s fashion and editorial director at Nordstrom, Jian DeLeon. Jian is dialing in to absolutely nerd out about the current and future landscape of retail, talking shop, dream collabs, flow team deluge, radical salary transparency, Dance Dance Revolution, tattoos and much more on this important and critical—Virgil Abloh’s words—episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
